    • Uses of Point in geometry

      Methods in geometry that return Point 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Point Triangle.findCircumcenter()
      Returns triangle's circumcenter, that is the point where the distance to all the vertices is same.
      Point Line.findIntersect(Line line)
      Returns point where this line and the given line intersects.
      Point Circle.getCentre() 
      Point Line.getEnd()
      Returns end point
      Point Line.getMidPoint()
      Returns the midpoint of this line, that is average of the start and end points
      Point Line.getStart()
      Returns start point
      Point Triangle.getVertex1()
      Returns vertex 1
      Point Triangle.getVertex2()
      Returns vertex 2
      Point Triangle.getVertex3()
      Returns vertex 3
      Methods in geometry that return types with arguments of type Point 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MyArrayList<Point> Circle.findPointsInside(MyArrayList<Point> listOfPoints)
      Returns points which are inside or on the circle
      MyArrayList<Point> Circle.findPointsInside(MyArrayList<Point> listOfPoints, MyHashSet<Point> setOfPointsToExlude)
      Returns points which are inside or on the circle and filters out from results if given points are found
      Methods in geometry with parameters of type Point 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      double Point.calculateDistance(Point point)
      Calculates distance from this point to given point
      double Point.calculateHaversineDistance(Point p)
      Calculates distance in km from this point to given point by Haversine formula, that is great-circle distance between points.
      double Triangle.calcWeightOfPoint(Point p)
      Returns value of given point calculated by barycentric coordinates.
      double[] Line.findPerpendicularLineByPoint(Point p)
      Returns line in perpendicular to this line so it goes through given point
      boolean Circle.isPointInside(Point p)
      Returns true if point is inside circle and false if it is outside.
      boolean Triangle.isPointInsideTriangle(Point p)
      Checks if given point is inside triangle.
      boolean Triangle.isPointOnTriangleSide(Point p)
      Returns true if point is on some of the lines between triangles vertexes.
      void Circle.setCentre(Point centre) 
      Method parameters in geometry with type arguments of type Point 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Returns points which are inside or on the circle and filters out from results if given points are found
      boolean Triangle.isValidDelaunay(MyArrayList<Point> listOfPoints)
      Checks if this triangle is a valid Delaunay triangle.
      Constructors in geometry with parameters of type Point 
      Constructor and Description
      Circle(Point centre, double radius)
      Creates a circle with given centre and radius
      Line(Point start, Point end)
      Creates a line with given start and end Point and calculates line's distance
      Triangle(Point vertex1, Point vertex2, Point vertex3)
      Creates a triangle with given vertexes
